Package com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.filter

Class SecurityFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.filter.SecurityFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter
    @WebFilter(filterName="SecurityFilter")
public class SecurityFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter
    SecurityFilter does not allow a User without admin privileges to browse pages which manages catalogue, users, and orders.

      • doFilter

        public void doFilter​(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request,
                     javax.servlet.ServletResponse response,
                     javax.servlet.FilterChain chain)
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     javax.servlet.ServletException
        Method doFilter retrieves a User from HttpSession and redirect them to error page if user is not an administrator.
        Specified by:
        doFilter in interface javax.servlet.Filter
        Parameters:
        request - request to process.
        response - response associated with the request.
        chain - provides access to the next filter in the chain for this filter to pass the request and response to for further processing.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown if an I/O error occurs during this filter's processing of the request
        javax.servlet.ServletException - is thrown if if the processing fails for any other reason.
